posts.title: Love Is Art Canvas And Paint Kit
posts.content: Turn the art of love making into literal art by getting down with the “love is art” canvas and paint kit. Creating your erotic masterpiece is easy – simply cover you and your lover’s body in paint, climb on top of the blank canvas, and start getting freaky!

posts.title: Portable Pizza Pouch
posts.content: Quell your pizza craving by keeping a delicious slice handy using this portable pizza pouch. The triangular plastic pouch features a convenient strap so you can use it like a necklace and a sturdy zip lock seal to ensure the slice stays fresh.

posts.title: Corgi Butt Coin Purse
posts.content: Show the world how much you love Corgis by keeping your cash inside this adorable Corgi butt coin purse. This cute little coin purse is crafted just like the bum of a cute little Corgi – complete with a little puffy tail and two small paws for an added comedic effect.

posts.title: Rolled Omelet Pan
posts.content: Enjoy a five star breakfast from the comfort of your own home by using the rolled omelet pan to prepare it. This specialized pan comes covered in a non-stick coating and features a unique shaped surface that makes preparing gourmet omelets a breeze.

posts.title: The Subtle Art Of Not Giving A Fuck
posts.content: Get on the path to a better life by learning how to face your fears and faults with The Subtle Art of Not Giving A Fuck. Through profane yet entertaining stories filled with ruthless humor, this captivating read will help you get to know your limitations and how to accept them.

posts.title: Shark Repellent Band
posts.content: Avoid becoming shark bait next time you’re out in the water by wearing this shark repellent band. Requiring no batteries or charging, this life saving device fits comfortably around the wrist or ankle and employs magnetic technology to deter sharks.

posts.title: Mighty Toiletries Organizer
posts.content: Help maintain cleanliness and order in your bathroom using the Mighty toiletries organizer. The innovative design allows you to conveniently stick it onto any smooth vertical surface to provide a handy storage spot for everything from your toothbrush to your razor.

posts.title: Mechanical DIY Safe
posts.content: Keep your valuables safe from greedy hands without spending a bundle on security by storing them in this mechanical DIY safe. This plywood safe comes in 179 pre-cut pieces which you can assemble into a small cube shaped safe complete with a 3-digit combination.

posts.title: Multi-Functional Self Defense Pen
posts.content: This multi-functional self defense pen makes the perfect addition to your everyday carry. Lightweight and durable, this sleek pen comes with a fidget spinner cap and features a tough T6063 aluminum frame that can be used as a self defense weapon.

posts.title: Bleeding Zombie Targets
posts.content: Prepare yourself for the zombie apocalypse with these life like Zombie practice targets that will instantly gush with blood when shot; You can even blow their heads off. Available in many zombie forms, from standard to nazi zombie, to even ex-girlfriend zombie targets.

posts.title: Light Matrix Cube
posts.content: Bring any room in your home to life by giving it a dash of color using this light matrix cube. This compact cube measures 4 inches all around, making it ideal for any desktop and comes fitted with 64 full color LEDs that create endless variations.

posts.title: Stress Relieving Scratch-Off City Posters
posts.content: Watch your favorite city come to life right before your very eyes by tracing one of these stress relieving scratch-off city posters. Just trace over the foil layer of these hand-drawn sketches with the wooden stylus to reveal the gold color underneath.
